author: sniper1by1
title: Nice collectable minifig and not too common
review:
The minifig Max is a nice little set containing only the minifig. It comes in a plastic bag and you can only get it, if you are member of the LEGO-club. It is given away for free on the LEGO-roadshows. Since it is not achievable everywhere its collectability is relatively high. One special are the painted-on sidebags of the trousers.

Pro's:

  • free

  • rare item

  • nice trousers

Con's:

  • none

If you can get one, don't wait!

author: Dino_Boys
title: Great Minifig!
review:
I got this minifig at a LEGO Club meeting I went to in Jan or Fed 2010. He is great!

  • Pros: Great figure!
  • Pants, which, on the side of each leg, are printed pockets! Sweet!
  • Hair that you can't get ANYWHERE else! (Actually, in Collectible Minifigures Series 1, 2, and 4, but those are in different colors).
  • Rare!
  • Free! (Except for the participation fee. But I believe they are given away free elsewhere.)
  • Cons: NONE!

 

Another peculiar thing I found with him, he seems to go perfectly with every theme: Power Miners, Star Wars, even Indiana Jones!

Overall, he is my favorite minifigures, and I'd say: If you have the chance to get him, GET HIM!

 

This is Dino Boy Pteradon, signing off ;)

author: Ernst
title: Mister LEGO
review:
Overall 5 bricks : I normally don't review minifigures like the CMF's but I make an exception for Max. Simply because I see Max as Mister LEGO and I consider myself lucky to have him since he never officially was for sale. A very cool minifigure with great torso and smile. If you can get your hands on it, a must have for the true LEGO collector.

 

Building 1 brick : no building needed.

 

Parts 5 bricks : The 5 bricks are for all parts but most for the unique torso with the Capital Orange M and the unique tan legs.

 

Playability 2 bricks : no playing options, but I use Max often as occupant when I have built a Creator house. So 2 bricks for Max for granted services.

 

Value 5 bricks : I got it for free when I bought The King's Castle from a specialized web shop. When I got it at first I didn't know the value of the little guy but now I treasure it. Several for sale on Bricklink for â‚¬7,50 so if you are a fan I advise to buy it.

author: Red_Five2
title: Max
review: The 'Max' minifigure is very rare. It comes with four pieces. His hair is brown. He has a wide smile with some weird eyes. His torso says the 'M' logo for 'Max'. The legs ate pretty normal except it has some pocket's.
